text: Gary Austin (October 18, 1941 â€“ April 1, 2017) was an American improvisational theatre teacher, writer, and director. He wrote two solo shows, "Church" and "Oil," and performed them coast to coast. His most recent show was "Gary Austin in Word And Song". He directed the improvisational group The Groundlings. Austin was born in Duncan, Oklahoma. He was raised in Dallas, Texas and in Santa Fe Springs, California. He studied at San Francisco State University. was married to Wenndy MacKenzie from 1990 until he died in 2017. They had one son together. Austin died on April 1, 2017 of cancer in Los Angeles, California, at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Gary Austin at AND Theatre Company *Gary Austin at The Groundlings * Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Educators from San Francisco Category:American entertainers Category:Writers from Oklahoma Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Writers from Dallas Category:Educators from Dallas
title: Gary Austin
